team.closingText: With us you will receive not only a product, but also a partnership based on trust and mutual understanding.

member1.name: Artyom Tarkhanov
member1.about1: We understand that every company is unique, so we work closely with our customers to create customized solutions that meet their needs.
member1.about2: Our team not only develops technologies, but also provides support at every stage of cooperation.

xr.title: XR PLACE
xr.desc: An innovative platform for 3D tours of future real estate

hero.description: Convenient tools for presenting real estate objects: create virtual tours with minimal time and resources.

philosophy.label: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text1: We offer a unique widget for creating virtual tours that allow your clients to explore properties in an interactive format.

widget.label: Widget
widget.description: Our widget creates immersive and realistic representations of real estate objects. This helps clients make informed decisions. We offer easy-to-use solutions that integrate seamlessly into your business processes.

cooperation.label: Cooperation
cooperation.description: Our clients are part of our team. You can always count on our support and expertise — we strive to make our partnership meaningful.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how it works
howItWorks.desc1: Our interactive solutions help your clients choose properties with confidence.
howItWorks.desc2: Create unforgettable experiences with our virtual tours.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Questions for Our Team
items: How can I install the widget on my site?
Can I customize the widget for my brand?
How can I create content for a virtual tour?
Is there a free trial available?
How do I find out the cost of the widget?
faq.answer: Installing the widget is simple and only takes a few steps. Once you follow the necessary instructions, you will also have access to our technical support, which will help you at any stage of the installation.

modal1.title: Ready to elevate your business?
modal1.description: Use our innovative widget to create captivating virtual tours and increase engagement with your properties.
